Pass to the Requests module, select Vacancy and click the Add Request button. This brings you to the Create Vacancy Request page. Fill in the form and click the Add Vacancy button to specify details of an individual vacancy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When you fill in the form, click the Save button to add this information to entire vacancy request. You can create several vacancies in one Vacancy Request.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At that point UPSA sends notification to the person you selected as approver of the request. After your request is approved local Talent Acquisition team starts searching for an appropriate candidate. Applicants for vacancies are proposed from the Telescope (former E3S) system that aggregates data about applicants from other internal recruiting systems such as Taleo and JiraHu.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After appropriate candidate is found and proposed for a vacancy, he/she should pass an interview.
